metadata.name: HackTool - Potential Remote Credential Dumping Activity Via CrackMapExec Or I...
metadata.comment: Detects default filenames output from the execution of CrackMapExec and Impacket-secretsdump against an endpoint.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\\\svchost.exe')) AND file.path rlike '\\\\Windows\\\\System32\\\\\[a-zA-Z0-9\]\{8\}\\.tmp$')

output.summary: Detects default filenames output from the execution of CrackMapExec and Impacket-secretsdump against an endpoint.
